import { Meta, Story, Preview, Props } from '@storybook/addon-docs/blocks';
import StoryRouter from 'storybook-react-router';
import { linkTo } from '@storybook/addon-links';
import { Link, Route, Switch } from 'react-router-dom';
import { withKnobs, text } from '@storybook/addon-knobs';

import { addThemeProvider } from './utils/decorators/theme';
import { NotFoundCard, lightTheme } from '../src';

<Meta title="UI Components/NotFoundCard" component={NotFoundCard} />

# NotFoundCard

Stories related to **NotFoundCard** component.

## Example

This is how you can use **NotFoundCard** component:

```jsx
import React from 'react';
import { Link } from 'react-router-dom';
import { NotFoundCard } from '@blackbox-vision/ui-components';
import { NotFoundImg } from './assets/not-found.svg';

export const MyNotFoundCard = () => (
  <NotFoundCard
    id="error"
    component={Link}
    to="/"
    image={NotFoundImg}
    message="¡Ups! Something went wrong"
    btnLabel="Back To Home"
  />
);

MyNotFoundCard.displayName = 'MyNotFoundCard';
```

## Live Preview

Here you can see the **NotFoundCard** component in action:

<Preview withSource="none">
  <Story
    name="Get started"
    decorators={[
      withKnobs,
      addThemeProvider(lightTheme),
      StoryRouter(
        {
          '/': linkTo('Header', 'home'),
        },
        { initialEntries: ['/not-found'] }
      ),
    ]}
  >
    <Switch>
      <Route exact path="/">
        I'm in home
      </Route>
      <Route exact path="/not-found">
        <NotFoundCard
          id="error"
          component={Link}
          to="/"
          image={text(
            'Image',
            'data:image/svg+xml;base64,'
          )}
          message={text('Message', '¡Ups! Something went wrong')}
          btnLabel={text('Button label', 'Back To Home')}
        />
      </Route>
    </Switch>
  </Story>
  <Story
    name="Without props"
    decorators={[
      withKnobs,
      addThemeProvider(lightTheme),
      StoryRouter(
        {
          '/': linkTo('Header', 'home'),
        },
        { initialEntries: ['/not-found'] }
      ),
    ]}
  >
    <Switch>
      <Route exact path="/">
        I'm in home
      </Route>
      <Route exact path="/not-found">
        <NotFoundCard id="error" component={Link} to="/" />
      </Route>
    </Switch>
  </Story>
</Preview>
